tests.test_bus_search module

Author: Samiul Ahamed Fhyas To run these tests:

python -m pytest tests/test_bus_search.py -v OR python tests/test_bus_search.py

tests.test_bus_search.test_distinct_stations_and_operators()[source]

Test getting distinct stations and operators.

tests.test_bus_search.test_get_all_enriched_routes()[source]

Test getting all routes with enriched data.

Test search fails when required fields are missing.

Test sorting results by price.

tests.test_bus_search.test_search_with_bus_type_filter()[source]

Test filtering search results by bus type.

tests.test_bus_search.test_search_with_no_results()[source]

Test search returns suggestions when no exact match found.

tests.test_bus_search.test_search_with_price_range()[source]

Test filtering by price range.

tests.test_bus_search.test_search_with_valid_route()[source]

Test searching for a valid route returns results.
